item.title: My Recommended Mods for X4: Foundations
item.author: Author
item.description: UPDATED FOR 7.0: In 2022 Steam Winter Sale X4 Foundations is seemingly getting some traction, and I keep seeing newcomers trying the game out and looking for tips. This post will not have tips perhaps, but I will recommend some solid mods for the game!

item.title: TehGM's Stalker Anomaly Modpack V2
item.author: Author
item.description: Some time ago I posted my modpack for Stalker Anomaly. Recently I got back to it, and made some changes. New guns and now it also looks stunning - come, download and install!

item.title: TehGM's Stalker Anomaly Modpack
item.author: Author
item.description: I compiled a quick modpack with the mods I use for Stalker Anomaly so you can download and experience it the way I do!

item.title: IMO: iZombie
item.author: Author
item.description: iZombie was my first Netflix show, and after a long time I 'finally' finished it. So let's see what's my opinion on it, shall we?

item.title: IMO: Ultimate Chicken Horse
item.author: Author
item.description:
As a gamer, I have to recommend a game. There are many games worth recommendation, and everyone has different preferred games style. However, there’s one game I’d recommend to anyone: Ultimate Chicken Horse.

I’m not really a reviewer, so I won’t explain everything, but first things first…

item.title: IMO: Game of Thrones
item.author: Author
item.description:
I was putting this show off for a long time. I really disliked how hyped it is. For some reason I hated how everyone is talking about it.
However, this summer I decided to catch up. I was fed up with spoilers all over the place - it was really hard to avoid them. Honestly, spoiling shows and films on purpose/without warning should be against the law, but unfortunately it isn’t, so it was about time to watch this thing.

Now, I’m not good at reviews, so I might not talk about everything I should. Treat this post (and all other IMO posts) as just opinions and thoughts rather than a comprehensive review.
